content: \> get email updates http //www shainabilow com/mailing-list to hear about shaina s new designs video tutorials class schedule and receive subscriber-only introductory discounts on pattern releases knit or crochet simple kippot for yourself and loved ones using fingering weight yarn these kippot are worked from the center towards the outer edges so they re easy to adapt if you d like to make them larger or smaller the knitted kippot pattern has two versions one that s seamless and one that s seamed if you aren t a fan of small circumference circular knitting you can knit the kippah flat and then seam it skills required knit magic_ring knit/purl increasing kfb decreasing k2tog binding off mattress stitch skills required crochet magic_ring single_crochet increasing decreasing for tutorial videos for these techniques visit shaina s youtube channel here https //www youtube com/shainabilow https //www youtube com/shainabilow elevate your knitting or knit game with our kippot pattern that offers a simple design suitable for all skill levels this versatile pattern allows you to create a beautiful yarmulke in adult size using a fingering weight yarn perfect for any occasion whether you prefer working in the round or flat this pattern provides clear instructions and a photo tutorial to guide you through starting the kippot with a magic_ring **unique features-** easy level pattern suitable for beginners seamless and seamed construction options available in adult size one size fits most can be worked in the round or flat for customization **materials needed-** stitch markers needle 3mm us size 2 5 yarn a good fingering fingering weight 45-65 yards gauge 30 stitches by 36 row = 4 inches in stockinette stitch
